ygData.subject: Re: patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour  question
ygData.msgSnippet: He s on Fenin Fo so you should know what to do...... To everyone else Once we get Roy s address, assemble at Bishan Coffee Bean. I hand you the parangs, steel
ygData.messageBody:
He's on Fenin Fo so you should know what to do......

To everyone else

Once we get Roy's address, assemble at Bishan Coffee Bean. I hand you the
parangs, steel pipes, metal chains and handphones there.

> >> patchwork].STOP...go on to blacksmithing.Making Studded armour is a waste

> >> money,its hard and expensive and low AC too,better on making banded mail]
> >>
> >> 1.Levels1-3:put all 15pt in Tailoring
> >> 2.Levels 4-6:by level6,u should maxout ya tailoring
> >> 3.Levels7+:all out pts on blacksmithing until "have to pay"stage
> >> 4.Levels4-16:sharpening,making skewers
> >> 5.Levels17-25:banded armour
> >> 6.Levels26++:Not sure heard its bronze plate after banded
